name: ElectionSpecification
description: A structured value providing information about an election.
title: ElectionSpecification

fields.name: validFrom
fields.title: validFrom
fields.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

fields.name: validThrough
fields.title: validThrough
fields.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

fields.name: candidacyFrom
fields.title: candidacyFrom
fields.description: The date when candidates will be able to apply for.

fields.name: candidacyThrough
fields.title: candidacyThrough
fields.description: The date after when candidates will not be able to apply for.
